title: ‘Drunk mother made son, 12, drive her and his younger siblings home’
text:
Francisca Saria, left, reportedly made her 12 year-old son drive her and his younger siblings home after she got drunk. The boy was pulled over after being spotted swerving across a busy road (Pictures: WKRG)

A drunk mother made her 12 year-old child son drive her and his younger siblings home, police say.

Francisca Darla Saria, 43, was allegedly caught making the youngster illegally chauffeur her home after the vehicle was spotted swerving across Highway 98 in Gulf Breeze, Florida, on Saturday.

Sheriff’s deputies were stunned to see who was behind the wheel of Saria’s GMC Terrain – and quickly noticed the mother smelt of booze, it is claimed.

She had put her two other children in the back seat, and was promptly arrested for permitting an unauthorized minor to drive and child neglect.

Locals were horrified to hear of the Saria’s alleged behavior, with Patrick Cronin branding her ‘an idiot.’

He told WKRG: ‘She should probably get fined or some sort of jail time.

‘You gotta learn your lesson somehow or other.’

Hayden Simmons added: ‘It’s hard to believe.

‘I would never let a 12 year-old drive a car and can’t imagine a 12 year-old being able to drive a car

And Bethany Harris was incredulous at what Saria is accused of doing, saying: ‘I mean they’re very brave..I would never.’

Saria has also been charged with driving without insurance, and has since been freed on $23,000 bond ahead of her next court appearance.
description: Francisca Saria's son was caught behind the wheel after cops spotted him swerving the car across a busy road in Gulf Breeze, Florida
